localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.
blogPost.body: An interactive space that shows how product management best practices work, including working examples of OKRs, outcome-based roadmaps, along with real examples of ideas, experiments, and customer feedback. Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.
blogPost.title: ProdPad Sandbox - Explore product mgmt best practices in an interactive space!
blogPost.author: Janna Bastow

localize.description: 一个展示产品管理最佳实践如何运作的互动空间，包括OKR的工作实例、基于结果的路线图，以及想法、实验和客户反馈的真实案例。添加、删除和移动项目，就像你在使用该工具管理自己的产品一样。
localize.tagline: 在互动空间中探索产品管理的最佳实践!

localize.description: 一個展示產品管理最佳實踐如何運作的互動空間，包括OKR的工作實例、基於結果的路線圖，以及想法、實驗和客戶反饋的真實案例。添加、刪除和移動項目，就像你在使用該工具管理自己的產品一樣。
localize.tagline: 在互動空間中探索產品管理的最佳實踐!

previous.excerpt: SVG Waves lets you generate waves instantly with clean simple lines. Quickly create consistent looking wavy patterns that are perfect for use on websites or documents.
previous.title: SVG Waves - Instantly generate SVG waves - made by a 12 year old 🌊

localize.description: SVG Waves可以让你用简洁的线条即时生成波浪。快速创建外观一致的波浪图案，非常适合在网站或文档中使用。
localize.tagline: 即时生成SVG波浪 - 由一个12岁的孩子制作 🌊。

localize.description: SVG Waves可以讓你用簡潔的線條即時生成波浪。快速創建外觀一致的波浪圖案，非常適合在網站或文檔中使用。
localize.tagline: 即時生成SVG波浪 - 由一個12歲的孩子製作 🌊。

next.excerpt: Bullet is a mobile and web app that helps you manage your tasks & events, and write your journal all in the same place. Inspired by the popular Bullet Journaling methodology.
next.title: Bullet Mobile - Manage your tasks, events and journal all on your mobile.

localize.description: Bullet是一款移动和网络应用，它可以帮助你管理你的任务和事件，并在同一个地方写日记。它的灵感来自于流行的Bullet Journaling方法。
localize.tagline: 在手机上管理你的任务、事件和日记。

localize.description: Bullet是一款移動和網絡應用，它可以幫助你管理你的任務和事件，並在同一個地方寫日記。它的靈感來自於流行的Bullet Journaling方法。
localize.tagline: 在手機上管理你的任務、事件和日記。
